body: I rebuilt my TF image against the updated nvidia base images. `nvidia-docker` still does not work out of the box. Running this within the container seems to work: `ln -s /usr/local/nvidia/lib64/libcuda.so.1 /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libcuda.so`
